reviews.review:
just when you thought you were over this game and have moved on....there it is again to help destroy friendships and pocketbooks.

5/7 a perfect score
очень класноя игра затягевает не спорю у меня 20 фпс но я както играю но иногда я за это бомблю и удаляю её но потом скачеваю снова советую поиграть:)
В этой игре ты потеряешь нервы, но возможно, приобретешь друзей!
I like cs it's really gud but sometimes i rage because of cheaters xd uwu
could be nuts, but is full with braindead smombies, raging russians, turkish and kids
Х*йня для любителей долбиться в очко. Советую
Fun and toxic I LOVE IT!
very good and challenging to learn the weapons.
good game! Recommended to me by the famous ESEA player Brotherman!
Actually fun game when russians don't ruin your runs :)
é uma merda duas mil horas pa nada
10/10 best way to almost smash your mouse and break your desk in an afternoon with online friends

Buen juego, al principio es bastante complicado pero mientras te vas a costumbrando vas mejorando, jugando al cs e mejorado mi nivel en practicamente todos los FPS, hay un dicho que dice "si sos bueno en el cs, sos bueno en cualquier juego".

Lo que no me gusta son los servidores de 64tickrate y los servidores de Brasil - Perú que son una cagada, el rendimiento anda más o menos,hay una comunidad muy toxica, te critican por todo practicamente y a veces hasta te critican por fallos que ellos cometieron, etc

¿Lo recomiendo?.

Si, si vas a dedicarle horas lo recomiendo, si es para jugar un rato meh. 

Pero es un juegaso.
It's a fun game to learn and get better at, and really fun when you can play it with friends and mess around in casual, or a private server

Melhor perca de tempo na vida! Lotado de hackers, wallhacks, aimbots, triggers, e ainda nao sei porque jogo isso! mais de 4 mil horas disso jogando pqp! Mas e o melhor jogo de teamplay que ja joguei e nao acho nenhum substituto ate o momento!

It's a fairly decent game when it comes to community servers, due to them having better performance than the Valve Official Servers, this game would be so much more better and dare I say maybe even better than CS: Source if the Hit Registration and Hit Boxes were fixed up, but even so if you like a more realistic graphic version of Counter-Strike I say go for it.
otimo jogo mais vou falar a verdade tem horas que faz uma raiva ainda mais quando pega nego trol ou boludo kkkkkk mais e top nostalgia
Как будто кто-то еще не знает про кс. Есть нервы идите в онлайн, нет -- чильте с друзьями на серваках, чтобы убить время -- отличная игра
Sigue siendo el rey del shooter y ellos lo saben.Aun que este año está siendo agradecido en cuanto a actualizaciones, falta el source 2
Good game, however, ranked is a mess and needs to be updated due to the amount of smurfs, hackers, and leavers that play ranked.
a game where you go pewpew, then say a few "nice" words to your teammates when you die, then pewpew some more. then it's gg ez from there on out, unless your silver then you're stuck there for lyfe.
Um bom jogo que te faz viciar, porém  sempre cai com boludo ou em serv americanos. E quase toda hora tem um hack nesse game, alem das skins desse jogo e chaves são mt caras
клос , но не то что раньше
One of the best games ever released...
Одна из крутых игр где не только можно хорошо провести время ну и сгореть в хлам), а так же неплохая игра для новичков стим, где можно поднять денжат.
jogo excelente, ótima jogabilidade e movimentação
ist halt Counterstike aber es macht trotzdem süchtig
